name: IOUserAudioSliderControl
desc: A control object that supports setting a 32-bit integer value.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the slider control class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of a slider control.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - HandleChangeControlValue
items.desc: Tells the slider control the value is changing.

items.name: - SetControlValue
items.desc: Sets the value of the slider control.

items.name: - GetControlValue
items.desc: Gets the value of the slider control.

items.name: - SetRange
items.desc: Sets the range of possible values for the slider.

items.name: - GetRange
items.desc: Gets the range of possible values for the slider.
